frontMatter.title: Stay informed of their form submission status
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to notify users about form submission progress and status.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern to notify users about form submission progress, receipt confirmation, and error states at critical touchpoints in the submission lifecycle.

when_to_use.value: **Any form with backend transmission.** When online forms transmit data to a backend system and require submission status updates.

design_principles.value: **Synchronous forms:** Send one 'Received' email notification for instant processing.
**Asynchronous forms:** Send three notificationsâ€”submission in progress, received, and action needed.
**Protect PII/PHI:** Exclude personal information and obscure filenames in notifications.
**Implement fallback notifications:** Try secondary email, then SMS, then veteran support handoff.

examples.description: Five email templates via VA Notify for different submission states.

examples.title: My VA status cards

examples.title: Form confirmation page
examples.description: Success message with what to expect next.

how_to_build.intro: The pattern addresses three key notification moments in the submission lifecycle.

steps.value: **Email notifications:** Use VA Notify templates reviewed by Privacy Officers.
**Protect PII/PHI:** Exclude personal information and obscure filenames.
**Implement fallbacks:** Try secondary email, then SMS, then veteran support handoff.
**Form confirmation pages:** Differentiate between 'submitted' (sync) and 'in progress' (async).
**What to expect section:** Explain next expected communications.
**My VA status cards:** Show Submission in progress, Received, or Action needed.

content_considerations.value: Email templates require Privacy Officer review before deployment.
Templates are available in VA Notify (requires account access).
Differentiate messaging between authenticated and unauthenticated users.

accessibility.value: Ensure status cards are accessible to screen readers.
Email content should be plain text friendly for accessibility.
Status updates should be clearly communicated without relying solely on color.
